Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO MENTAL HEALTH

Title: Permits facilities to be dually licensed under the office of mental health and the office of addiction services and supports
Summary: Permits facilities to be dually licensed under the office of mental health and the office of addiction services and supports.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to permitting facilities to be dually licensed under the office of mental health and the office of addiction services and supports
